src:
4 Smartphone Murah yang Dilengkapi NFC, Harga Mulai Rp 1 Jutaan
04 Nov 2019, 03:07 by Mansur
HP Murah yang Punya NFC di Indonesia
Oketekno – Dahulu untuk mencari ponsel yang telah dilengkapi dengan NFC cukup sulit, dan kebanyakan hadir di ponsel kelas Premium Samsung dan Apple. Akan tetapi semakin banyaknya pembayaran digital sekarang ini, NFC mulai merajalela dan bahkan Smartphone Murah sekalipun kini telah memilikinya.
Hanya saja di Indonesia masih belum banyak Ponsel murah yang dilengkapi dengan NFC kali ini. Dalam pembahasan kali ini cuman ada 4 Smartphone yang direkomendasikan, berdasarkan harga yang terjangkau banget. Bahkan salah satu modelnya ada yang cuman dibanderol sejutaan saja.

Baca Juga: 

Tampil Mewah, HP Android Murah Ini Segera Hadir di Indonesia


Tentu sudah pada penasaran kan? Yuk, langsung saja simak pembahasan lengkapnya sebagai berikut.
Ponsel Termurah di Indonesia yang Dilengkapi NFC


Samsung Galaxy A30s




Copyright©Samsung

Ponsel ini punya layar AMOLED 6.4 inci HD+, dan dipacu oleh chipset Exynos 7904 serta didukung oleh internal RAM 4GB. Ini menjadi yang paling mahal dalam daftar rekomendasi berikut, Samsung menawarkannya dengan harga Rp 3.299 juta. Di segmen yang lebih tinggi ada Galaxy A50s, yang juga sudah dilengkapi dengan NFC. Ketahui Spesifikasinya lebih banyak melalui tautan ini.

Baca Juga: 

Sekilas Tentang Spesifikasi Samsung Galaxy A30s dan Harganya di Indonesia




Redmi Note 8 Pro




Copyright©AndroidPIT

Jelas saja kalian sudah tidak asing lagi dengan ponsel ini, dikarenakan Redmi Note 8 Pro juga baru datang ke Indonesia. Dibanderol mulai Rp 3.099.000,-, Smartphone murah dari Redmi ini sudah dilengkapi dengan NFC dan juga kamera 64MP loh. Luar biasa bukan? Dan jangan lupa cari tau spesifikasi lengkapnya disini.

Baca Juga: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Harga Mahal Bukan Jaminan



ASUS Zenfone 5Q




Copyright ©JAMOnline

Sudah beredar lama banget sih di Indonesia, namun masih tetap mampu bersaing dengan fitur NFC yang tertanamkan. Zenfone 5Q dibanderol Rp 2.6 jutaan saja, dan keunggulan lain yang dimiliki oleh ponsel ini terletak pada bagian kameranya.

Baca Juga: 

Hasil Jepretan Kamera Makro Redmi Note 8, HP Murah yang Nggak Murahan




Nokia 3.1 Plus




Copyright ©The Verge

Ini dia ponsel paling murah dengan fitur NFC di Indonesia. Hanya dijual dengan harga Rp 1.9 juta saja, namun sudah punya teknologi yang biasa tertanam di ponsel Premium. Selain itu, Nokia 3.1 Plus juga sudah dilengkapi dengan dual kamera belakang 13MP + 5MP, untuk hasilkan jepretan yang ciamik.
Itulah keempat Smartphone Murah di Indonesia yang menawarkan fitur NFC, dimana bisa digunakan untuk transaksi online dengan mudah dan cepat.
baca juga: Jadwal Lengkap Update Android 10 Untuk Nokia Android Series
text:
4 Cheap Smartphones Equipped with NFC, Prices Start at Rp. 1 Million
Nov 04 2019, 03:07 by Mansur
Cheap cellphones that have NFC in Indonesia
Oketekno - In the past it was difficult to find mobile phones that were equipped with NFC, and most were present in Samsung and Apple Premium class phones. But with more and more digital payments nowadays, NFC is starting to run rampant and even the Cheap Smartphone now has it.
It's just that in Indonesia there are still not many cheap mobile phones equipped with NFC this time. In this discussion there are only 4 recommended smartphones, based on the very affordable price. Even one of the models is only priced at a million.

Also Read:

Appear Fancy, This Cheap Android Mobile Coming Soon in Indonesia


Certainly already curious right? Let's just refer to the complete discussion as follows.
Cheapest Mobile Phones in Indonesia Equipped with NFC


Samsung Galaxy A30s




Copyright © Samsung

This phone has a 6.4 inch HD + AMOLED screen, and is driven by the Exynos 7904 chipset and is supported by 4GB of internal RAM. This is the most expensive in the following list of recommendations, Samsung offers it at Rp. 3,299 million. In the higher segment there is the Galaxy A50s, which is also equipped with NFC. Learn more about the specifications via this link.

Also Read:

Overview of Samsung Galaxy A30s Specifications and Prices in Indonesia




Redmi Note 8 Pro




Copyright © AndroidPIT

Obviously you are already familiar with this phone, because Redmi Note 8 Pro also just came to Indonesia. Starting from Rp. 3,099,000, this cheap smartphone from Redmi is already equipped with NFC and also a 64MP camera. Amazing is not it? And don't forget to find out the full specifications here.

Also Read: Redmi Note 8 Pro Vs Samsung Galaxy A50s, Expensive Prices Are Not Guaranteed



ASUS Zenfone 5Q




Copyright © JAMOnline

It's been circulating for a long time in Indonesia, but it's still able to compete with embedded NFC features. Zenfone 5Q is priced at only Rp2.6 million, and another advantage possessed by this phone lies in the camera.

Also Read:

Redmi Note 8 Macro Camera Capture Results, Cheap and Cheap Phone




Nokia 3.1 Plus




Copyright © The Verge

Here it is the cheapest cellphone with NFC feature in Indonesia. Only sold at Rp 1.9 million, but already have the usual technology embedded in Premium mobile phones. In addition, the Nokia 3.1 Plus is also equipped with dual 13MP + 5MP rear cameras, to produce great shots.
That's the fourth Cheap Smartphone in Indonesia that offers NFC features, which can be used for online transactions easily and quickly.
Also read: Complete Schedule of Android 10 Updates for Nokia Android Series
